trans-unit.source: Defines identifiers used to indicate the type of filter that a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來表示類型之篩選的識別項的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a toolbox item filter string is allowed, but not required.
trans-unit.target: 表示工具箱項目篩選條件字串，允許，但非必要。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that custom processing is required to determine whether to use a toolbox item filter string.
trans-unit.target: 表示自訂處理，才能判斷是否要使用工具箱項目篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: This type of ToolboxItemFilterType is typically specified on a root designer class to indicate that the designer wishes to accept or reject a toolbox item through code.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的 ToolboxItemFilterType 通常會指定根設計工具類別，表示設計工具想要接受或拒絕執行程式碼的工具箱項目上。

trans-unit.source: The designer must implement the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具必須實作<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser>介面。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a toolbox item filter string is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 表示不允許的工具箱項目篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: If a designer and a component class both have a filter string and one has a ToolboxItemFilterType of Prevent, the toolbox item will not be available.
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具和元件類別都具有篩選條件字串，其中具有 ToolboxItemFilterType 的防止工具箱項目將無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a toolbox item filter string must be present for a toolbox item to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 表示工具箱項目篩選條件字串必須要有啟用工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: For a toolbox item with a filter type of Require to be enabled, the designer and the component class must have a matching filter string.
trans-unit.target: 具有篩選類型的工具箱項目需要啟用，在設計工具和元件類別必須具有相符的篩選字串。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, neither the designer or component class can have a ToolboxItemFilterType of Prevent for the toolbox item to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在設計工具或元件類別都不可以有 ToolboxItemFilterType 的防止工具箱項目的啟用。
